too_expensive.psychology: They don't see the value yet

responses.response: I understand. Let me ask - what would it be worth to you to [achieve outcome]? Most of our customers find that [Product] pays for itself within [timeframe] because [ROI explanation].
What if I could show you how [Product] saves [X hours/dollars] per month? At [price], you'd break even in [timeframe] and everything after is pure savings.
Compared to [alternative - hiring, building, competitor], [Product] is actually [X%] of the cost. And you get [unique benefits].

no_budget.objection: We don't have budget right now
no_budget.psychology: Could be real or a polite no

responses.response: I totally understand. When does your next budget cycle begin? I'd love to schedule a follow-up then.
What if we started with a smaller pilot? We could do [reduced scope] at [reduced price] so you can prove the value before committing more budget.
That's great that you're already solving this. I'm curious - what made you choose [Competitor]? Is there anything you wish it did better?
We actually hear from a lot of [Competitor] users. The main difference is [key differentiator]. Would it be valuable to see a comparison?

That's definitely an option. In our experience, building something like this takes [X engineer-months]. At average salary, that's [$Y] plus ongoing maintenance. [Product] is [$Z/year] and we handle all the updates.
Totally understand wanting control. Quick question - is building [this type of tool] core to your business? Or would your engineers' time be better spent on [your core product]?

need_approval.objection: I need to talk to my team/boss
need_approval.psychology: Not the decision maker, or avoiding commitment

responses.response: Of course! What information would help you make the case internally? I can put together [one-pager/ROI doc/comparison] for you to share.
I'd be happy to join a call with your team to answer any questions. Would it help if I walked them through a demo?
Absolutely. [Customer A] saw [X% improvement] in [metric] within [timeframe]. [Customer B] saved [Y hours/dollars] per month. Would you like me to connect you with a reference?
Let's run a measured pilot. We'll define success metrics upfront, and you can see the ROI firsthand before committing.
I appreciate you sharing that. What didn't work about the previous tool? I want to make sure we're actually different before taking more of your time.
That's fair. Many of our customers came from [similar tools]. The key difference is [unique mechanism]. Would you be open to seeing how we're different?
